medical_history.chief_complaint: Ulcerated and bleeding nodule protruding on a brownish plaque over the scalp.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began half a year ago. The patient has numerous cutaneous brownish macules all over the body since childhood, with dark brownish to blackish plaques noted on the trunk.
medical_history.past_medical_history: LEOPARD syndrome characterized by multiple physical abnormalities including bilateral deafness, ocular hypertelorism, prognathism, and short stature. Electrocardiogram showed inversion of T wave in several leads, and echocardiogram showed regurgitation of mitral, pulmonary, and tricuspid valves.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's parents and three sisters did not have any features of LEOPARD syndrome.
